about_the_game:
The Ichorous Moon rises. The guardian bells of Türme are silent. It's institutions fractured by change and in-fighting.
Race through the night to save the city, or condemn it.

Unique 2.5D perspective


  • Carve a path through the streets of Türme, but watch your back!
  • An infinite runner when outdoors, get indoors before the moons influence overwhelms you!
  • Use your lantern and gear to fight through waves of afflicted city-folk and creatures

Rhythm based combat


  • Charge through overwhelming numbers unscathed, if you have the skills
  • Dodge hits in waves of QTE challenges
  • Slow time to effortlessly defeat uncountable swarms
  • Customise your combat ability with a variety of spells and gear

Die, respawn, advance… but time is always ticking down


  • The bells you ring can't toll forever; waste no time.
  • Respawn at the last belltower you reached, and mark your progress through town.
  • Rougelike progression; your run is over if you die after time runs out!
  • Procedurally generated city, each run is unique!

Collect ichor and use it wisely to enhance your body and mind


  • Balance your build or choose a specialization and face the consequences!
  • Craft or upgrade your lantern and gear with the mechanical fortune teller
  • RPG-lite stat system

Don't get overcome by the moons power; seek refuge throughout the city, help the innocent, uncover the rot that has brought the city near ruin


  • Roguelike infinite runner
  • Multiple endings
  • Factions to support or betray
  • Drama; deliver petty insults on behalf of people you meet!
  • Built for controllers
  • Endless mode in each area

name: Ichorous Moon

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8.1, 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E4500 (2 * 2200) or equivalent, AMD Athlon 64 X2 Dual Core 3600+ (2 * 1910) or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 7300 GT (512 MB), Radeon X1300 Pro (256 MB)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8.1, 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E4500 (2 * 2200) or equivalent, AMD Athlon 64 X2 Dual Core 3600+ (2 * 1910) or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 7300 GT (512 MB), Radeon X1300 Pro (256 MB)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Run! Race through the corrupted streets of Türme to stop the rising of the Ichorous Moon
